title: How to Make Video Black and White in Adobe Premiere

steps.title: Drag your video into a sequence.
steps.content: Drag your video into a sequence. [1] X Research source

steps.title: In the Effects tab (located in bottom left corner), open the Video Effects folder.
steps.content: In the Effects tab (located in bottom left corner), open the Video Effects folder. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Image Control folder.
steps.content: Open the Image Control folder. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Under Image Control, select and drag the Black and White function onto the video clip.
steps.content: Under Image Control, select and drag the Black and White function onto the video clip. [4] X Research source The video should turn to black and white in your preview box, if your cursor is over the video clip. [5] X Research source
